title: Antichrist

description.plain:
In the 8th track of the album, Eminem continues the diabolical theme of “Evil” and “Lucifer” by now proclaiming himself as the titled “Antichrist” and emphasizing his role as a provocateur in the music industry.

The song takes aim at the current “woke” cultural climate and is filled with Shady’s signature explicit descriptions, and mentions of various celebrity figures such as Kanye West, Jeffrey Epstein, and Diddy. He also alludes to his past controversies and his combative relationship with critics and societal expectations. Bizarre also joins Eminem on the track, delivering his own classic vulgar and disturbing verse reminiscent of D12 days.

embed_content: Read “Antichrist” by Eminem on Genius

The song takes aim at the current “woke” cultural climate and is filled with Shady’s signature explicit descriptions, and mentions of various celebrity figures such as Kanye West, Jeffrey Epstein, and Diddy.
